channel.title: How do you chang the spawn area,
channel.description: Of a NPC, right now I have NPCs that spawn in a place in the starting area which I cannot get to because you can't open the doors, the source is DDSspec. Thanks!

item.title: How do you chang the spawn area,
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

goto [ config ] in ur server files, and then u will see [ autospawn ] search for the NPC u need to change,

E.G - i wud search for, spawn = 2263 3017 then i wud find,

spawn = 2263 3017 4824 0 3021 4828 2975 4820 1
all u do is change the, spawn = 2263 3017 to were eva u wana put the NPC,

the spawn = 2263 3017 is my example.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you chang the spawn area,
